item.title: French Toast
item.description: Ingredients: Fresh or lightly stale bread 1 tablespoon powdered sugar Maple syrup Berries (whichever you prefer; strawberries, raspberries, blueberries) 2 eggs 1dl milk 1 teaspoon cinnamon Method: Beat the 2 eggs with 1dl of milk in a bowl. Add the cinnamon to the mixture and stir until properly incorporated. Heat up a pan with some butter on medium heat. Dip the bread in to the mixture both sides and put on the heated pan.
